Package com.aproteam.ioucash.viewmodel

Class AddTransactionViewModel

java.lang.Object
androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
com.aproteam.ioucash.viewmodel.AddTransactionViewModel
public class AddTransactionViewModel extends androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
ViewModel for adding a transaction view of the application. Manages the data and logic in adding the transaction view.
